definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Even the Hitlers had not destroyed it by wantoning and indiscriminate bombing to London.
sentences.chinese: 二戰中納粹德國對倫敦的狂轟濫炸也未能將它摧毀。

sentences.english: that had led to barbarism of Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 導致了納粹德國的野蠻暴行。

sentences.english: Nazi Germany attacked the Soviet Union in the middle of nineteen forty-one.
sentences.chinese: 納粹德國襲擊了一九四一年中間蘇聯。

sentences.english: For years, Soviet propaganda blamed the massacre on Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，蘇聯的宣傳機構一直栽贓納粹德國。

sentences.english: Nazi Gemany levied war upon the Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 納粹德國向蘇聯發動戰爭。

sentences.english: The Luftwaffe was defeated by the British in 1940 – before Barbarossa.
sentences.chinese: 納粹德國空軍在1940年被英國打敗。

sentences.english: The Soviet Union's ethnic murders predated Nazi Germany's.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯的種族屠殺要早於納粹德國。

sentences.english: 1939 - Canada declares war on Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 1939年的今天，加拿大向納粹德國宣戰。

sentences.english: Nazi Germany owned about 268,829 square miles of land.
sentences.chinese: 納粹德國當時擁有約268，829平方英里的土地。

sentences.english: Nazi Germany possessed most of Europe during World War Ⅱ.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大戰期間納粹德國佔領了歐洲大部分地區。

sentences.english: Japan was by no means always universally popular in Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 日本從來沒有在納粹德國普遍受歡迎過。

sentences.english: Nazi Germany nearly swallowed up the whole Europe in World War Ⅱ.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大戰中，納粹德國幾乎吞併了整個歐洲。

sentences.english: All true; but we know what happened to Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，不過我們都知道納粹德國是怎麼一回事。

sentences.english: The slave-labour system of Nazi Germany originated from its theory of racialism .
sentences.chinese: 納粹德國的奴隸勞動制度淵源於納粹的“種族理論”。
法蘭西，納粹德國的鄰居。

pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980
(Claire) Chennault, commander of Flying Tigers during World War II
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945
